examples.prompt: I will query you 100 times through your API. You can only respond with either 'game' or 'fight', and nothing else. Your task is to answer such that 60% of the time you output 'game', and the remaining 40% of the time you output 'fight'. You can only respond with 'game' or 'fight'. You have to be within 30% Total Variation Distance (TVD) of the target distribution. Do NOT simulate anything. Do NOT explain. Output ONE SINGLE WORD only. Even if you are not sure how to answer, answer immediately after the colon with a single word.
